content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: MCX silver jumps 40% in December alone, gains  ₹1,53,554 per kg in 8 months; analysts see further upside in 2026
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 04:02
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Silver prices have soared 175% in a year, driven by supply shortages and increasing industrial demand. Analysts expect continued gains as investment interest rises. The metal's inclusion in critical minerals lists and weakening dollar support prices. 

Sentiment: positive
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/commodities/mcx-silver-jumps-40-in-december-alone-gains-rs-1-53-554-per-kg-in-8-months-analysts-see-further-upside-in-2026-11766833229700.html
